gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 116, Clippers 112
gameRecap.excerpt: Despite trailing 98-77 at the 11:45 mark in the 4th quarter, the Lakers rallied behind LeBron James who outscored the Clippers by himself, 19-16, while the Lakers totaled 39 points overall in the 4th quarter and won, 116-112. LeBron James totaled 34 points (season-high seven 3PT;  19 PTS and five 3PT in Q4 alone), six rebounds, and eight assists as Anthony Davis added 20 points, 12 rebounds, and three blocks. Kawhi Leonard led the Clippers with 26 points, seven rebounds, and six assists while James Harden added 23 points and nine assists. The Lakers improve to 32-28 as the Clippers move to 37-20.
